---
title: "Subscribe to French Course"
format: html
---

<script>
    const plans = [
        {
            name: "Monthly Plan",
            price: "$50/month",
            link: "https://buy.stripe.com/test_5kAbJwbVA0IXd0IfYY",
            features: ["Access to all lessons", "New content every week", "Cancel anytime"]
        },
        {
            name: "Yearly Plan",
            price: "$450/year",
            link: "https://buy.stripe.com/test_5kAbJwbVA0IXd0IfYY",
            features: ["Access to all lessons", "New content every week", "3 months free compared to monthly"]
        },
        {
            name: "Coaching with Mentor",
            price: "$300/month",
            link: "https://buy.stripe.com/test_5kAbJwbVA0IXd0IfYY",
            features: ["Personalized coaching", "Tailored lesson plans", "Weekly progress reviews", "Direct feedback and support"]
        }
    ];

    function renderPlans(containerId) {
        const container = document.getElementById(containerId);
        if (!container) return;

        let html = "";
        plans.forEach(plan => {
            html += `
                <div class="pricing-card">
                    <h2>${plan.name}</h2>
                    <p><strong>${plan.price}</strong></p>
                    <ul>
                        ${plan.features.map(feature => `<li> ${feature}</li>`).join("")}
                    </ul>
                    <a href="${plan.link}" class="btn btn-primary" target="_blank">
                        Subscribe Now
                    </a>
                </div>
            `;
        });

        container.innerHTML = html;
    }

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        renderPlans("pricing-container-en");
        renderPlans("pricing-container-fr");
    });
</script>

::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}

Choose a plan that works best for you:
<div id="pricing-container-en" class="pricing-container"></div>
:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="french"}

Choisissez le plan qui vous convient le mieux :
<div id="pricing-container-fr" class="pricing-container"></div>
:::
